title: Michelin - worldwide number of employees by region 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 5 number of Regions.
The Number of employees is highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
There is a difference of 68751.0 between the maximum Region Europe and minimum Region Africa India Middle-East.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Number of employees in each Region on the y axis.
Region Europe has the highest Number of employees and Africa India Middle-East has the lowest Number of employees.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of employees for 5 number of Regions.
The Number of employees is highest at Region Europe and lowest at Region Africa India Middle-East.
There is a difference of 68751.0 between the maximum Region Europe and minimum Region Africa India Middle-East.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Region, and Number of employees in each Region on the y axis.
The maximum Number of employees 70599.0 is found at Region Europe and the minimum is found at Africa India Middle-East where Region is 1848.0.
The highest Region Europe has 68751.0 more Number of employees than the lowest Region Africa India Middle-East.
Number of employees at Region Europe is 70599.0 , second place is North America at 21541.0, and thirdly is Asia (excl. India) at 15259.0.
The Region Africa India Middle-East has 3.01 times less Number of employees than average.
